long_description: Tiny yet oh-so-useful, the Swiss-Tech Micro-Max 19-in-1 multitool clamps securely onto a keyring. You'll hardly know this comprehensive and versatile set of tools is there until you need it! Solid, stainless-steel design features a patented quick-release and self-locking mechanism and folds out into 19 tools. Includes 2 hex wrenches, 6 screwdrivers, pliers, wire cutter, wire stripper, wire crimper, hand drill, file, bottle opener, 2 rulers (mm and in.) and 2 ruler extensions. Precision pliers with positive-grip jaws lock to any keyring when not in use. The Swiss-Tech Micro-Max 19-in-1 multitool measures a mere 1.87 x 1.31 x 0.25 in.
short_description: Tiny yet oh-so-useful, the Swiss-Tech Micro-Max 19-in-1 multitool clamps securely onto a keyring. You'll hardly know this comprehensive and versatile set of tools is there until you need it!
